name.description: The license name used for the API.

url.description: A URL to the license used for the API. MUST be in the format of a URL.

License.title: License
License.description: `License` is a representation of OpenAPI v2 specification's License object. See: https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/3.0.0/versions/2.0.md#licenseObject Example:  option (grpc.gateway.protoc_gen_openapiv2.options.openapiv2_swagger) = {    info: {      ...      license: {        name: "BSD 3-Clause License";        url: "https://github.com/grpc-ecosystem/grpc-gateway/blob/main/LICENSE.txt";      };      ...    };    ...  };
